patterns: What is the meaning of origami?
responses: Origami is the Japanese art of paper folding, often associated with Japanese culture. The goal is to transform a flat sheet of paper into a finished sculpture through folding techniques.

patterns: How to make an origami butterfly?
Can you show me how to make an origami butterfly?
responses: Sure! You can follow this video tutorial to make an origami butterfly: [Origami Butterfly Tutorial](https://youtu.be/1o205ZfC_GU?si=MGJY5Foa2lSidgLO)
